text: Hope all is well at your end
I miss those golden days when we use to study together
Comment vas tu? ca fait longtemps
I have been calling you since all morning
Why did you go through all that hassle
Where are you? I have been waiting for you
Well played at the games today bro!
Let's go for a bike ride to central London
I am so excited I am travelling this weekend
Did you find what I asked you to look for?
When are you coming home tonight?
